definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

pinyin: ci2 hui4 pan4 duan4 ren4 wu5
ci2 hui4 pan4 duan4 zuo4 ye4

sentences.english: Libertarian says you can't know just from the facts I've just given you.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，你不能僅從這個事實來判斷。

sentences.english: In short, they might make better ethical decisions than people.
sentences.chinese: 簡言之，它們會比人類做出更恰當的道德判斷。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth , your father was right when he said that you undersold the company.
sentences.chinese: 老實告訴你，你父親對你低價拋售公司的判斷是對的。

sentences.english: Diagnoses a clade or monophyletic group.
sentences.chinese: 判斷一個演化支或單源羣。

sentences.english: The home plate umpire calls balls and strikes and runs the game.
sentences.chinese: 司球裁判負責判斷壞球與擊球和推進比賽的進行。

sentences.english: Partial judges that we are of our own excellencies , and other men's defaults!
sentences.chinese: 這片面的判斷源於我們的尊貴和別人的違約。

sentences.english: Oscillographic titration is a new method for end point indication.
sentences.chinese: 示波滴定是判斷滴定終點的一種新方法。

sentences.english: Moral judgement has no place in the world of remediating disability.
sentences.chinese: 在醫治缺陷的世界裏道德判斷沒市場。

sentences.english: Feelings often stand in the way of forgiveness, veiling judgment and common sense.
sentences.chinese: 情緒總是會影響判斷和理智，從而阻礙寬恕的發生。

sentences.english: I know no way of judging of the future but by the past.
sentences.chinese: 我深知，除了經歷，決無別的可用來判斷未來。

sentences.english: Being drunk or high can impact teens’ judgment and decision making skills.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒或吸毒會影響青少年的判斷能力和做決定的技能。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents the word-end boundary assertion.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於判斷單詞結束邊界的字符。

sentences.english: I bet our team will win.
sentences.chinese: 我敢判斷我們隊準能獲勝。

sentences.english: Let’s all buy the collection and decide for ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們買這本集子，自己去判斷吧。

sentences.english: But voters will judge him by how he played it.
sentences.chinese: 但投票者將會從他乾的好不好來判斷他。

sentences.english: For that, we also need to check the boundary points, or look at the behavior of a function, at infinity.
sentences.chinese: 還得比較邊界點，或判斷函數在無窮遠處值。

definition: conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
